Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi took 5 wickets for 54 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed satisfaction with the win
Babar Azam admitted shortcomings in defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia moved level on points with Pakistan and South Africa
Pakistan take on Bangladesh in Mumbai on Monday
Others: The match was played at M.Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bangalore
The match was reduced to 20 overs per side due to rain
